data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Francois Letexier signals a throw-in for Strasbourg, close to Metz's area.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Strasbourg close to the penalty box.
Ludovic Ajorque for Strasbourg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Metz at Stade de la Meinau.
In the minute 4, Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Strasbourg, Metz push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Metz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 6, Can Strasbourg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Metz's half?
Throw-in for Metz at Stade de la Meinau.
Free kick Strasbourg.
In the minute 7, Free kick in a good position for Strasbourg!
Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
Strasbourg have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 10, Strasbourg's Habib Diallo misses with an attempt on goal.
Francois Letexier awards Metz a goal kick.
Francois Letexier signals a Strasbourg throw-in in Metz's half.
In the minute 12, Strasbourg's Alexander Djiku gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Strasbourg.
Ball safe as Metz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 14, Free kick for Metz in the half of Strasbourg.
Corner awarded to Metz.
Strasbourg needs to be cautious. Metz have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 18, Metz have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Strasbourg goal kick.
Metz have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
In the minute 21, Ball goes out of play for a Strasbourg goal kick.
Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Metz territory.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
In the minute 27, In Strasbourg Strasbourg attack through Mehdi Chahiri. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Strasbourg.
Strasbourg are pushing forward but Habib Diallo's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 28, Francois Letexier awards Metz a goal kick.
Free kick for Strasbourg in their own half.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
In the minute 31, Francois Letexier awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Strasbourg.
Throw-in for Metz at Stade de la Meinau.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Metz in their own half.
Penalty! Francois Letexier points to the spot, great chance for Metz...
At Stade de la Meinau, Mohamed Simakan has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 35, Goal! Dylan Bronn gives Metz the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 0-1.
Metz advance rapidly upfield but Francois Letexier blows for offside.
Strasbourg's Ludovic Ajorque breaks free at Stade de la Meinau. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 37, Metz have a goal kick.
Warren Tchimbembe of Metz gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Strasbourg at Stade de la Meinau.
In the minute 39, Throw-in high up the field for Strasbourg in Strasbourg.
Strasbourg are coming forward and Mohamed Simakan gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Metz at Stade de la Meinau.
In the minute 40, Ball safe as Strasbourg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Strasbourg needs to be cautious. Metz have an attacking throw-in.
Metz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 42, Can Metz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Strasbourg's half?
Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Metz.
Throw-in for Metz in the half of Strasbourg.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half is underway at Stade de la Meinau.
Francois Letexier awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 46, Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Metz have been awarded a penalty in Strasbourg...
Metz were awarded a penalty ... Which Dylan Bronn failed to convert!
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to Metz.
Ball goes out of play for a Metz goal kick.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Strasbourg in their own half.
In the minute 53, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ludovic Ajorque (Strasbourg) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
In the minute 57, Throw-in Strasbourg.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
In the minute 62, Metz have a goal kick.
Francois Letexier awards Strasbourg a goal kick.
Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
In the minute 66, Mohamed Simakan equalizes with a header to make it 1-1.
Great play from Dimitri Lienard to set up the goal.
Francois Letexier signals a Metz throw-in in Strasbourg's half.
In the minute 68, Throw-in Metz.
Free kick for Strasbourg in their own half.
Goal! Opa Nguette gives Metz a 1-2 lead in Strasbourg.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Metz at Stade de la Meinau.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Strasbourg.
Thomas Delaine (Metz) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 74, Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Strasbourg.
Thierry Laurey is making the team's first substitution at Stade de la Meinau with Jean-Eudes Aholou replacing Ibrahima Sissoko.
Strasbourg make their second substitution with Lucien Kevin Zohi replacing Mehdi Chahiri.
In the minute 76, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Strasbourg close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Metz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Adrien Thomasson is on target to level the scores at 2-2.
In the minute 78, Habib Diallo with an assist there.
Metz have a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Can Metz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Strasbourg's half?
Habib Maiga (Metz) has received a first yellow card.
Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Francois Letexier signals a throw-in for Strasbourg, close to Metz's area.
In the minute 82, Goal kick for Metz at Stade de la Meinau.
Francois Letexier awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Metz.
In the minute 83, Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Strasbourg in their own half.
Adrien Thomasson for Strasbourg has been booked by Francois Letexier and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
In the minute 86, Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Metz territory.
Strasbourg's Habib Diallo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Francois Letexier awards Metz a goal kick.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Strasbourg close to the penalty box.
Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Metz's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Metz goal kick.
Metz to take a throw-in in Strasbourg territory.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Strasbourg.
Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
In Strasbourg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Full-time! The final score is 2-2.
The away team have replaced Warren Tchimbembe with Youssef Maziz. This is the first substitution made today by Frederic Antonetti.
Kiki is booked for the away team.
Metz's Victorien Angban has been booked in Strasbourg.
Jean-Eudes Aholou (Strasbourg) has received a yellow card from Francois Letexier.
